content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of predicting the future or forecasting the development of scientific advancements. However, as of now, the technology used in the proton pack is purely fictional and isn't possible in real life. However, many of the technologies and concepts in the proton pack have real-world counterparts, such as particle accelerators and nuclear reactors, which could inspire future innovations. Who knows, maybe one day we'll see some groundbreaking discovery that revolutionizes the field of ghost hunting!
